title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, February 23, 2021
description: It was on this day in 1954 that the first inoculation of 137 children for polio began with the vaccine was developed by Jonas Salk. "Our greatest responsibility is to be good ancestors."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
